body_html:
I asked David to send this PR so we could see how we could get an XLA device added as a purely external library via tf.load_library. These are the changes he had to make to get something to load, but we should figure out what changes to TF need to be made to allow this support.

I'm going to be OOO most of this week, so if someone wants to jump in, great! I'll return this when I am back

body:
I asked David to send this PR so we could see how we could get an XLA device added as a purely external library via tf.load_library.  These are the changes he had to make to get something to load, but we should figure out what changes to TF need to be made to allow this support.

I'm going to be OOO most of this week, so if someone wants to jump in, great!  I'll return this when I am back
